live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
60268.summary: Some customers in the Silver Heights area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
60268.title: Apr 18 - Winnipeg (Silver Heights) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
